TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberCrefSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.CrefSyntax

Docs.summary: The unqualified part of a CrefSyntax. For example, "ToString()" in "object.ToString()". NOTE: TypeCrefSyntax, QualifiedCrefSyntax, and MemberCrefSyntax overlap. The syntax in a TypeCrefSyntax will always be bound as type, so it's safer to use QualifiedCrefSyntax or MemberCrefSyntax if the symbol might be a non-type member.
